body_content.explanation: a tropical forest in which trees and plants grow very closely together:
examples: The Yanomami people live in the South American jungle.
Either side of the river is dense, impenetrable jungle.

body_content.explanation: an uncontrolled or confusing mass of things:
examples: Our garden is a real jungle.

body_content.explanation: a situation in which it is difficult to succeed because a lot of people are competing against each other:
examples: You've got to be determined in this life - it's a jungle out there, kid.

body_content.explanation: a type of popular dance music with an extremely fast rhythm and a low range of musical notes
